c74object.name: tap.lfo~
c74object.description: The tap.lfo~ object is very efficient owing to the fact that it only calculates a new value once per signal vector rather than for every sample.

method.name: reset
method.description: Reset the phase of the oscillator.

attribute.name: frequency
attribute.description: The frequency of the LFO in Hertz.

attribute.name: depth
attribute.description: The depth of the LFO in Hertz.

attribute.name: shape
attribute.description: The waveform of the LFO. The options are sine, triangle, square, ramp, sawtooth.
